specialQualities.text: Horrid Appereance: burst 60', permanent consumption 1d4 str, 1d4 con, 1d4 con (For 10 + 13 + 7)
Wail: cone 60' or burst 30', death effect (For 10 + 13 + 7)
Incorporeal Touch: +21 (14 base attack + 7 char), 1d8 + permanent loss 1d4 char (For 10 + 13 + 7)
Incorporeal: 50% against corporeal sources, except against ghost weapons
